Congratulation to our Tory Burch Dubai Mall and all the best wishes.

ooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>; MUSE Operations <MUSE.Operations@chalhoub.com>; Aaiza Zafar <Aaiza.Zafar@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO (UAE) - NEW STORE RE-OPENING | (TORY BURCH- Dubai Mall ) 
 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of TORY BURCH– DUBAI MALL.

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the 8th Nov at 10 am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project : 

 

*	Brand team, @Nesrine KRIAA <mailto:Nesrine.Kriaa@chalhoub.com> @Rami SABOUNI <mailto:Rami.Sabouni@chalhoub.com> @Tory Burch Dubai Mall <mailto:ToryBurch.DubaiMall@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT team @Ali Zeb Siyal <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com> @Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com> @Ahmed Zakaria <mailto:Ahmed.Zakaria@chalhoub.com>  
*	Admin team @Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  @Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com> @Mary Janice Dofeliz <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com> @Sharon Pinto <mailto:Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com> @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 
*	Maintenance team @Sreeraj Prakasam <mailto:Sreeraj.Prakasam@chalhoub.com> @Sajumon Shanmughan <mailto:Sajumon.Shanmughan@chalhoub.com> @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com> 
*	GA team @Mohammed El Neel <mailto:Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com> @Mahmoud Abd Hamid <mailto:Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com> @Salwa Al Mamari <mailto:Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com>  
*	Accounts @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  @Mohamed Rauf <mailto:Mohamed.Rauf@chalhoub.com> 
*	Logistics / Warehouse @Sheljan KOCHAPPAN1 <mailto:Sheljan.KOCHAPPAN1@chalhoub.com> @Sredha Mathai <mailto:Sredha.Mathai@chalhoub.com> @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net> 
*	Group Security @Rawad Hossein <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> 
*	3d TEAM : @Chadi Dagher <mailto:Chadi.Dagher@3d-consultants.com> @Prathap Pandiyan <mailto:Prathap.Pandiyan@3d-consultants.com> 
*	Muse team @Aparna Gopalakrishnan <mailto:Aparna.Gopalakrishnan@chalhoub.com>
